titles.title: A bill to suspend until December 31, 1991, the duty on transparent acrylic decorative articles containing a cavity formed in one wall.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/25/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1991, the duty on transparent acrylic decorative articles containing a cavity formed in one wall.
